title: Kerala Ayurveda Academy USA - Ayurveda Courses
description: Kerala Ayurveda Academy is the premier ayurvedic school to learn Ayurveda for ll levels online or in-person at our Milpitas campus.
cleaned_text: Discover your innate potential for mind, body and spirit wellness - whether you are a health seeker or professional student of Ayurvedic science. We're committed to providing the traditional teachings from the root Vedic texts in modern formats. Our academy is approved to operate by the [Bureau for Private Postsecondary Education (BPPE)](https://www.bppe.ca.gov/), California. The approval to operate means compliance with state standards as set forth in the California Private Postsecondary Act of 2009 and Division 7.5 of Title 5 of the California Code of Regulations. We are an organizational member of the [National Ayurvedic Medical Association](https://www.ayurvedanama.org/) and [California Ayurvedic Association of Ayurvedic Medicine](https://www.ayurveda-caam.org/about-caam/) Kerala Ayurveda Academy encourages diversity and accepts students from all backgrounds. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, creed, color, national origin, sex, gender, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, or the presence of any sensory, mental, or physical disability. It's our intention to make Ayurveda accessible to all and to create a safe space for learning and healing.
